MemberSignature.Value: public bool SendVendorSpecificResultCode (Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device, string command, string arg);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SendVendorSpecificResultCode(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device, string command, string arg) cil managed
member this.SendVendorSpecificResultCode : Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice * string * string -> bool

Docs.param: The argument that will be attached to the command.
Docs.summary: Sends a vendor-specific unsolicited result code to the headset.
Docs.returns: false if there is no headset connected, or if the command is not an allowed vendor-specific unsolicited result code, or on error. true otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool StartVoiceRecognition(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device) cil managed

Docs.summary: Start Bluetooth voice recognition.
Docs.returns: false if there is no headset connected, or the connected headset doesn't support voice recognition, or voice recognition is already started, or audio channel is occupied, or on error, true otherwise

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool StopVoiceRecognition(class Android.Bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device) cil managed

Docs.summary: Stop Bluetooth Voice Recognition mode, and shut down the Bluetooth audio path.
Docs.returns: false if there is no headset connected, or voice recognition has not started, or voice recognition has ended on this headset, or on error, true otherwise
